text:
👨‍⚕️The EU Medicines Agency @EMA_News just recommended to grant the #BioNTech #Pfizer Covid19 vaccine a conditional marketing authorisation after thorough analysis of its safety & efficacy.

➡️ This opinion paves the way for the 1st EU 🇪🇺 authorisation of a #Covid19 #vaccine (1/2). https://t.co/iREkLePfQL
